<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1287</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">War, Peace and Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krieg, Frieden und Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Guerre, paix et Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Guerra, paz e Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Guerra, pace e Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πόλεμος, ειρήνη και Judaism1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Guerra, paz y Judaism1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The first lesson in a four-lesson unit. learners look at war and peace from the perspective of Biblical history and Jewish ethics by studying traditional Jewish texts. learners will be challenged to consider how Judaism synthesizes war and peace.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jewish texts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">war</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">peace</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">history</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die erste Lektion eine in den Vierlektion 
Maßeinheit Anfängern betrachten Krieg und Frieden von der 
Perspektive der biblischen Geschichte und der jüdischen Ethik, indem 
man traditionelle jüdische Textanfänger studiert, wird 
herausgefordert, zu betrachten, wie Judentum Krieg und Frieden 
synthetisiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La première leçon dans des étudiants d'une 
unité de quatre-leçon regardent la guerre et la paix de la 
perspective de l'histoire biblique et de l'éthique juive en étudiant
les étudiants juifs traditionnels des textes sera défiée de 
considérer comment le judaïsme synthétise la guerre et la paix.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A primeira lição em learners de uma unidade da 
quatro-lição olha a guerra e a paz do perspective do history 
biblical e do ethics jewish estudando learners jewish tradicionais dos
textos será desafiada considerar como o judaism synthesizes a guerra 
e a paz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La prima lezione nei principianti dell'unità di 
quattro-lezione guarda la guerra e la pace dalla prospettiva di storia
biblica e dell'etica ebrea studiando i principianti ebrei tradizionali
dei testi sarà sfidata a considerare come il judaism sintetizza la 
guerra e la pace.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρώτο μάθημα στους αρχαρίους τέσσερις-μαθήματος 
μονάδων εξετάζει τον πόλεμο και την ειρήνη από την προοπτική της
βιβλικής ιστορίας και η εβραϊκή ηθική με τη μελέτη των 
παραδοσιακών εβραϊκών αρχαρίων κειμένων θα προκληθεί για να 
εξετάσει πώς Judaism συνθέτει τον πόλεμο και την ειρήνη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La primera lección en principiantes de una 
unidad de la cuatro-leccio'n mira guerra y la paz de la perspectiva de
la historia bíblica y del ética judío estudiando a los 
principiantes judíos tradicionales de los textos será desafiada a 
considerar cómo el judaísmo sintetiza guerra y paz.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Jüdische Texte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Judentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Krieg</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
